titleStmt.title: SII 13.121: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 121. (A.R. No. 47 of 1923.) PUḶḶALŪR, CONJEEVERAM TALUK, CHINGLEPUT DISTRICT. ON STONES BUILT INTO THE WALLS OF THE KĀMĀKSHIYAMMAṈ SHRINE, KAILĀSANĀTHA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This records the decision of the assembly of Paramēśvara-chaturvēdimaṅgalam (evidently the present Puḷḷalūr) in Eyiṟ-kōṭṭam including the samvatsara-vāriyaperumakkaḷ (members of the Annual Supervision Committee) and two other dignitaries Pirāṉadhi[kārigaḷ], to purchase back and reassign the land which had originally belonged to the temple of Tirumēṟṟaḷi-Mahādēva at the village, for providing with the income therefrom for the sacred bath of the deity and worship and offerings during the three services in the temple every day. It was also resolved by them to form a flower-garden for the temple with the paṭṭi land to the north and west of the temple compound.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovirājakesaripanmaṟku yāṇṭu 5Āvatu Eyiṟkoṭṭattu parameśvaracatu rve bhaiyomum sammatsaravāriyañ ceykiṉṟa vāriyaperumakkaḷum pirāṉ Ati
ṉ kuṭaiyāṉum pirāyūruṭaiyāṉum Iruntu Ivūr tirumeṟṟaḷimahādevarkku śivabrāhmaṇar ceyka ṭutta paricāvatu Ivūr teṉkarai cen=taṉkāliṉ teṉpakkattu Idevar muṉ Āṇṭuvarukiṉṟa pu
ṉ nilam paḻanilavaḻi kuḻivan=tavāṟṟāl Uṇṇila moḻiviṉṟi Ellāṅ koṇṭu Idevarkku muṉṟu sandhiyu muṭṭāmai tiru ciyampoḻtu Irunāḻi Ariciyāl tiru vamutu kāṭṭuvārkaḷāka(ḷāka)vum Ivaṉaittiloṉṟu sandhiyil muṭṭil mañ
kālumāka poṉ daṇṭamu miṟuttu tāṅkaḷe snamanamāṭṭi Ippaṭi muṭṭāmai ceyvārkaḷākavum ceyyārākil Avāṇṭu vāriya rume Ippaṭi daṇḍam koṇṭu Idevarkke kuṭukkakaṭavārākavum Iśrīkoyiliṉ vaṭakkil tiruccuṟṟālaikku vaṭakku
meṟku kolviḻun=tavāṟṟāl paṭṭinilaṅ koṇṭu Idevarkku tirunan=tavāna mākkikoḷḷap peṟuvārākavum Idharmattiṟku vi� Iṭaic ceytār ceyta pāvattup paṭuvārākavum Idhanmam rakṣittār varggam candrātittavat duḥkhamiṉṟi jilippārākavu mippa
kuṭuttom sabhaiyom sabhai tiruvaṭiyār paṇikka Eḻutiṉeṉ Ivūr madhyastaṉ maṅkala Uttamaṉ makaṉ kaṟpaka Alaṅkāraneṉ ..
Digital edition of SII 13.121 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
